[[tabview]]
[[tab Personnels]]
Select file.
[[/tab]]
[[tab "Yotsuhoshi"'s Personnel File]]
**Name:** Yotsuhoshi ("四星")

**Security Clearance Level:** [REDACTED]

**Position:** HMCL Director of the Japanese Branch

**Job:** Checking containment, monitoring foundation staffs, communicating with headquarters, --buying cup noodles-- at Site-817 and Site-8171

**Person & History:** A (possibly) Japanese woman of unknown race. Known to be choked on a rice cake in 1899, but the details of her history are unknown. She is friendly, but tends to speak with an undertone. Addicted to ramen.

"I recommend the niboshi-broth ramen."

**Related Files:** 
[REDACTED]

[[/tab]]
[[tab Dr. Seimei's Personnel File]]
**Name:** Saneaki Seimei (晴明 心灯)

**Security Clearance Level:** 3

**Position:** Foundation Researcher

**Job:** Mental evaluation and counseling of objects and staffs, research on objects that are related to deities and faith. Located in Site-8171 (travel required).

**Person & History:** A Japanese man of Asian descent. Son of Seimei Touro (Professor Seimei), who is known for ███ ██████████ ██ ███ ██████ ██ █████████ ████████. Enrolled at Prichard Academy from kindergarten to university. He has a calm demeanor, but sometimes gets into mischief. He is an keyboard-warrior.

"The concept of "God" is actually a pretty vague concept, and that applies to the deities that the Foundation has grasped. It cannot be lumped together."

**Related Files:** 
[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/log-of-anomalous-items-jp/name/01536 AO-1536-JP]
[[[SCP-6777]]]
[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/application-experiment-of-chameleon-filter-system Page for Experiment of Application of Chameleon-Filter-System and Automatic Conversion of Clinical Tones]
[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/maima-the-traitor Maima the Traitor]

[[/tab]]
[[tab ???]]
Coming Soon……

[[/tab]]

[[=]]
**About the Author**
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block
|name=http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A5018858-8-lkfp/Karathh_Icon
|caption=Icon made by [[*user Mishary]]. Cool.
|align=center
|clear=true
|width=300px]]
> 
> **Handle:** Karathhun/2001 (からすん/2001)
> 
> **Wikidot Account:** [[*user Karathh]]
> 
> **Birthday:** July 4th
> 
> **Details:** Japanese, registered as a member of EN in December 2018. Then registered as a member of the Japanese Branch in March of the following year.
> 
> Wrote [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-2010-jp SCP-2010-JP] as the first positive-rating article in JP at the end of January 2020.
> 
> Won the Kimetama Contest 2020, a privately held contest in August 2020.
> 
> Wrote [[[SCP-6173]]] with [[*user ponhiro]] as the first article in EN, at the end of May 2021.
> 
> Now active both at EN and JP. Planning to introduce not only the international SCPs to EN, but also the international GoIs and canons.
> 
> Active as "Karathh Uta" while outside the Wikidot.
> 
> Favorite Artist: [https://youtube.com/channel/UCLXxry0HqEz_mzHSsXwrhYg Wotoha]
> 
> **Link:** **[https://twitter.com/karathhuuuun X (Formally Twitter)]**　**[https://www.instagram.com/karathhun_2001/ Instagram]**　**[https://m.youtube.com/@karathhun_2001 YouTube]**　**[https://bsky.app/profile/karathhuuuun.bsky.social Bluesky]**　**[https://karathhun-2001.carrd.co/ Carrd]**
@@@@
[[=]]
**Contact**
[[/=]]

> **X (Twitter):** I'm usually here. Critique OK, Drawings for the article is sometimes OK.
> 
> **JP Branch Discord:** I check here everyday, so I can respond. Critique OK, Drawings for the article is sometimes OK.
> 
> **Wikidot PM:** I don't prefer because it's kinda hard to use.
> 
> **SCP Declassified Discord:** Mostly silent, but I'll reply if you called me.
> 
> **IRC:** I'm not there.
> 
> **Telepathy:** No.
